content: put next 58 60 66 70 76 sts on a waste yarn for first sleeve turn work to wrong side and cable cast on 12 12 14 16 16 sts turn to right side and k101 115 123 130 143 sts put next 58 60 66 70 76 sts on a waste yarn for second sleeve turn work to wrong side and cable cast on 12 12 14 16 16 sts turn to right side and k50 57 61 65 71 note your beginning of the round marker remains at the centre back for the body of the sweater your stitch count for the body will be 226 254 274 292 318 knit even in stockinette for 12 5 30 cm or 11/2 4 cm less than desired length repeat rounds 1 and 2 of the yoke instructions to make a chain knit 4 rounds repeat rounds 1 and 2 of yoke k1 round next round *ktbl p1 repeat from * across all sts repeat last round 6 more times then bind off loosely in rib pattern note i did not change to a smaller needle for the ribbed section of the body sleeves return 58 60 66 70 76 held sts to main needle size you can choose between a long wire for magic looping a small wire for knitting in the round or dpns starting at the centre of the underarm pick up and knit 6 6 7 8 8 of the cast on sts then pick up 1 or 2 extra sts in the corner to help avoid gaps knit the sleeve sts on the needle pick up and knit 1 or 2 extra sts at the second corner gap of the underarm then pick up and knit remaining 6 6 7 8 8 cast on sts place a marker for the beginning of the round you will have 70 72 80 86 92 sts knit 4 rounds however for the first round or two you will need to remove the extra stitches picked up in the gap area use a k2tog at the first gap and an ssk at the second gap and repeat again in the next round if you have picked up 2 extra sts you can lengthen the sleeve at this point by knitting more rounds in stockinette stitch repeat rounds 1 and 2 of the yoke instructions to make a chain knit 4 rounds repeat rounds 1 and 2 of yoke once more change to smaller size ribbing needles next round *ktbl p1 repeat from * across all sts repeat last round 6 more times then bind off loosely in rib pattern weave in ends and block lightly lace chart row 1 *k3 yo sk2p yo repeat from * across round row 2 4 6 8 knits all sts row 3 *yo sk2p yo k3 repeat from * across round row 5 same as row 1 row 7 same as row 3
